works.description:
I work as an independent cam model for cam4.com. This image and any other images or videos that are tied to the name ChristyBytes are illegal screen caps of performances done while I am on cam4. No one owns these images because they are not supposed to exist, the only reason they do is due to illegal screen caps of me. I am the person in the photos and videos and have requested to have them removed on multiple occasions and they are still up. 
Cam4 also states that its users are not allowed to screen cap, as it is illegal, and images of me taken as screen caps are my property and the only business or individual that is allows to legally screen cap my performances is Cam4. None of these caps were taken either by myself or by Cam4.
